title: MAC Copy and Paste function
body: I know on PC you can do ctrl-A then ctrl-C and copy your text in-game. This dos not work on MAC. command-A/C/P don't work. Has anybody found a solution for this?

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure I understand your question.  Are you asking how to do this in a general sense for a Mac?  Because Command-C/P should work.

Or are you trying to copy/paste something directly into League of Legends?  In which case, are you trying to copy/paste something into chat and it isn't working?

Reply back and let me know!  I should be able to help!
I want to be able to copy text in game such as "mid flash 13:50." I haven't found any way to do this on mac. The command function doesn't seem to work in game.
